name: Sibling Scare
description: Scare your sibling! Use ←↑→↓ keys to sneak up on your sibling, but be careful they know you're coming and have laid out traps to stop you from getting to them. *Special thanks to the creators of p5.js and p5.play for making the creation of this game possible; as well as Dr. S and my classmates in Texas Tech's Introduction to Game Development for helping me with my code.*
